index: function (doc) { index("default", doc.sample.name); if (doc.sample.name) { index("name", doc.sample.name, { "store": "yes" }); } if (doc.grouping) { index("grouping", doc.grouping, { "store": "yes" }); } if (doc.sample.description) { index("description", doc.sample.description, { "store": "yes" }); } if (doc.measurement.results.length > 0) { for (var i = 0; i < doc.measurement.results.length; i++) { index("isotope", doc.measurement.results[i].isotope, {"store": "yes"}); index("type", doc.measurement.results[i].type,{"store":"yes"}); index("value", doc.measurement.results[i].type,{"store":"value"}); index("unit", doc.measurement.results[i].type,{"store":"unit"});}}}
